ðŸ“– Summary: UI-TARS Desktop is a GUI agent application that allows users to control their computer using natural language. It leverages a Vision-Language Model for screenshot and visual recognition, enabling precise mouse and keyboard control across multiple platforms. The application offers real-time feedback and ensures privacy through local processing.
